reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Travel Makeup Brush Holder - Get it before sold out
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. I want to breakdown the review to go over all the wonderful features of this carry case.I ordered the pink and was not disappointed in the color. Its so pretty. It's a light baby pink color, not too light or dark, a good shade. Makes it easy to find in bag as well as it looks good on a counter. Very pleasant neutral color for a pink shade.It arrived in a manufacturers box, sealed. Product was placed in an inside clear bag to protect it. There were no scratches or imperfections on this case. In the past, venders sent out items not wrapped which were made of the same material and had markings on it. This company took the time and care to properly package their item which I liked. Its very lightweight, super soft, and durableThis is a roomy holder. It's long also which I thought was a plus as I have several brushes and makeup tools that are on the longer side. There is a push button through hold closure which is great as you can adjust the closure width it you have alot of brushes or items inside. If you have a few, then the clasp can fit into a second hole that makes a tighter fit.Inside you can actually put makeup cleaner and scrub your brushes on the go. I have not used it in that capacity, but I have other silicone makeup cleaner pads that have similiar markings to help clean the brushes. This item as alot of markings to use for that, which go up the sides of holder half way. I bet this washes the brushes amazingly. Product dried quickly after initial washing and color stayed true.I can see this item being used for combs, small brushes, even hair scruchies. Its thickness is not chunky which is good, very streamlined for packing. I hope they come out with other products to hold larger items with the same design.I highly recommend this item, and it would make a great gift. I plan on ordering more in different colors to separate my items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The travel-friendly construction and excellent build quality make it ideal for on-the-go use. I adore the color and the soft silicone texture, which doesn't attract as much hair and dust as some other silicone products. It comfortably accommodates all my essential makeup brushes, including 4 medium-sized and 3 small ones, with an additional slot for extra brushes. While I haven't tested its brush-cleaning capabilities yet, it appears easy to clean and features textures suitable for the task.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WORTH EVERY PENNY!
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my wife being in her list to buy. She said she really loves it. It's very durable, easy to clean and holds quite a few brushes. Very good for traveling. The material is high quality. It also has a qood stretch to it if you have long brushes, to fit into the opening. She also loves the color. Overall, it was a very good buy and will 100% recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Travel makeup Brush Holder I’ve had
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this little makeup brush holder it’s the perfect size, love the color and texture easy to clean and pack it’s also very durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A jet setter's must have: compact, chic and convenient
reviews.reviewText: Review: "This travel makeup brush holder is a game-changer for beauty enthusiasts on the go! The sleek design not only keeps my brushes organized but also adds a touch of elegance to my travel essentials. Its compact size fits perfectly in my luggage, ensuring that I never compromise on style while exploring new destinations. The durable material provides excellent protection for my brushes, and the secure closure keeps them in place. Say goodbye to messy makeup bags and hello to organized glamour – this holder is a jetsetter's dream come true!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfuny Make up brush bag travel holder silicone makeup
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality. Colour is perfect. Flexible and fits as described. Receiving package was very good. Received fast. Highly recommend. Very easy to clean and fits in every bag. Will purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel and so pretty!
reviews.reviewText: Love this product for travel, easily holds all of my brushes even the bigger setting powder brushes. Buckle is secure and stays closed, easy to clean with the bonus feature of having the brush cleaner on the inside of the pouch. Beautiful color would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfuny Makeup Brush Travel Holder
reviews.reviewText: I am new to using make up brushes to apply my make up. I also travel quite a bit for work. This case is perfect for me, it holds 3 of my brushes, lip gloss, mascara and a slim perfume container. It has an added bonus of having "grippers" on the inside bottom that assist with easy brush cleaning. The button front closure works well and allows the case to become smaller or larger depending on how much stuff you have in it. It is also a plus that the case is made of silicone which is not only flexible but also easy to clean. I love it!
Good to organise makeup brushes and other cosmetics.

The size is perfect for makeup brushes. But the material quality is not much good, when you take it in hands you realise it, even in compare with other product I ordered from other seller, the difference is obviously. The material will be collect all dust around. Also the color doesn't look much good. Otherwise it's ok product.

This product doesn’t have anything inside to clean the brushes. This was the main reason why I got this product. Quality is below average.There are many products out there at even cheaper prices. I would suggest not to go for this product.
